name: aza/math
description: AzaMath - Anizoptera CMF mathematic component. Arbitrary precision arithmetic (for huge integers; BCMath wrapper) and universal convertor between positional numeral systems (supported bases from 2 to 62 inclusive, and systems with custom alphabet; pure PHP realisation, can use GMP and core PHP functions for speed optimization).

suggest.ext-bcmath: Install the BCMath (Binary Calculator Arbitrary Precision Mathematics) extension to work with arbitrary precision arithmetic operations.
suggest.ext-gmp: Install the GMP (GNU Multiple Precision) extension in order to speed up number systems conversions and (in future) arbitrary precision arithmetic operations.
